title: SERVER RULES
description: Please read and follow our server rules carefully. These guidelines help maintain a friendly and enjoyable environment for all players.

categories.title: General Rules
rules: Be respectful to all players and staff members
No harassment, bullying, or discrimination of any kind
English only in global chat (other languages in private)
No advertising of other servers or websites
No spamming chat, commands, or actions
Follow staff instructions at all times
Keep chat conversations appropriate at all times

categories.title: Gameplay Rules
rules: No cheating, hacking, or using modified clients for unfair advantages
No exploiting bugs or glitches - report them instead
No griefing or destroying other players builds
No stealing from other players
No intentional lagging or crashing of the server
PvP rules depend on the specific area or game mode
Respect claim boundaries and protected areas

categories.title: Chat Rules
rules: No swearing or inappropriate language
No discussing politics or religious topics
No sharing personal information in public chat
No excessive use of caps or special characters
No spamming or flooding the chat
Report rule breakers to staff rather than confronting them
Keep conversations relevant to the server

categories.title: Punishments
rules: First offense: temporary mute/ban depending on severity
Second offense: temporary ban with longer duration
Severe violations may result in immediate permanent ban
Staff have final say in all punishment decisions
Appeals can be made through our Discord server
Evading punishments will result in extended penalties

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: Breaking any of these rules may result in punishment including mutes, kicks, temporary bans, or permanent bans depending on the severity. Staff decisions are final, but appeals can be made through our Discord server.
